Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the character of the Human Meteor, his origin, and his initial confrontation with underwater divers, leading to a land-based mystery involving rich playboys and a potential G-Man.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The story begins underwater, introducing the Human Meteor and an immediate conflict with divers.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke O'Dowd transitions to his taxi driver persona, picking up suspicious passengers and noticing he is being followed.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ride to the Waterfront and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Duke arrives at the pier, transforms into Human Meteor, and confronts the car he suspected was following him.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Pier and Transformation

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Revelation and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: In the hospital, a new plot is revealed, leading to Duke planning a risky stowaway mission with Toby.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Revelation of Yacht and Submarine Plot
Duke's Plan and Toby's Stowaway Mission

Major_Arcs.title: Yacht Investigation and Submarine Encounter
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the investigation of the yacht, switching perspectives between Pete's suspicion and Duke/Toby's infiltration, culminating in the revelation of a Japanese submarine and Namor's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Deck Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Pete observes suspicious activities on the yacht, unaware of the larger plot.

sub_scenes.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Submarine Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Duke, as Toby, discovers the depth chart and falls overboard, leading to the revelation of the submarine and the captain's acknowledgement.

narrative_arcs.title: Depth Chart Discovery and Sudden Fall

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Intervention and Underwater Combat
sub_scenes.description: Namor enters the scene, diving to investigate and encountering enemy divers and the submarine operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Sunken Submarine Discovery and Underwater Encounter
Subduing a Diver and Submarine's Evasion
Confrontation with the Red Suit Diver and Underwater Struggle

sub_scenes.title: Surface Attack and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: The conflict moves to the surface with Namor attacking the ship, and the aftermath observed by ship crew and divers.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Surface Attack on the Ship with Torpedo

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Pursuit and Espionage Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Namor pursues the yacht, discovers Peter's death and his connection to the Jap Navy, leading to a quick resolution and Holden's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter in Diving Helmet
Investigation in Peter's Cabin and Jap Navy Connection
Confirmation of Peter's Double Life and Swift Action
Driving Toby Home After a Long Day
Arriving Home and Mother's Concern for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads confronting Nazi Fiends, and a separate mystery unfolds with an ambulance and two boys investigating.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads engage in a standoff with Nazi Fiends, setting up a conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Boys' Observation
sub_scenes.description: Two boys observe an ambulance arriving at a house, sparking their curiosity and investigation.

sub_scenes.title: The Wallet Clue and Garage Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: The boys find a dropped wallet, leading them to a garage and a new mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Clue
Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Interception and Journey to Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: The boys are intercepted by police, who take them to Mr. Horst.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys, while his henchmen plot a sinister method to get rid of them.

sub_scenes.title: Bronson's Violent Rescue and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Major Bronson intervenes violently, leading to a chaotic fight and the boys escaping to seek help.

sub_scenes.title: Secret Office Discovery and Sabotage Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Boys split up, one encounters Chuck, and they discover a secret office revealing Nazi sabotage plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Head to Waterfront for Help

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Crash and Office Stand-off
sub_scenes.description: A car crashes at the Marine Barracks, while Skip defends himself in an office stand-off with gunmen, leading to Major Bronson's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Marines Arrival and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Marines arrive, leading to a fight and the resolution of the Nazi spy ring plot, with recognition for the heroes.

narrative_arcs.title: The Marines Engage in a Scrap
Urgent Medical Aid for the Major

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ in South America and Rosita's Kidnapping
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to South America, introducing The Champ and Henry, who get entangled in the kidnapping of President's daughter, Rosita, by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of The Champ in South America
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of The Champ and Henry in a South American setting.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting the Scene
Arrival in a Sleepy South American Town

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Dismissal by Officers
sub_scenes.description: Champ and Henry are interrogated by local officers about Rosita, but then abruptly dismissed.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Journey
sub_scenes.description: Exposition on El Tigre's ransom demands, followed by a forced car journey involving different characters.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Revelation at the House

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Plan and Infiltration of Hideout
sub_scenes.description: Clarification of the rescue mission, leading to a stealthy infiltration of El Tigre's hideout using a diversion.

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and True Enemy Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Humiliation and interrogation of a man in garbage, leading to the revelation of Axis agents misusing El Tigre's name.

sub_scenes.title: Internal Dispute and Rescue Mission Initiation
sub_scenes.description: Internal conflict about El Tigre's allegiance is interrupted by news of Rosita's location, leading to an urgent rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Infiltration and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Pursuit of Axis forces, hotel infiltration, and finding Rosita amidst combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Initial Attack on Axis Forces
Seeking Refuge and Planning Entry via Rear

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Fight and Recognition for Champ
sub_scenes.description: Intense fighting within the hotel, Rosita's bravery, and recognition for Champ's heroism.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Deployment and Presidential Orders
Gratitude for Life-Saving Bravery and Recognition
Arrival of Government Troops and Search for Rosita

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and Sub Detector Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan fighting spies and uncovering a plot involving his sub detector plans and foreign agents in a jungle setting.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Grave Report
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan fights spies in the jungle and receives a grave report about disobedience and compromised plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Grave Report and Canal Zone Discussion
Dolan's Displeasure and Sub Detector Plans

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Tracking and Native Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dolan tracks through the jungle, evades a dart attack, and is ambushed by native warriors.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Interrogation, and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Capture and interrogation of spies, leading to a coerced betrayal to obtain Dolan's sub detector plans.

narrative_arcs.title: Fatherland's Demand and Hot Iron Threat

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Diversion, and Native Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan regrets burning something, a diversion is set, and Dolan forms an unexpected alliance with natives after fighting their chief.

Major_Arcs.title: Captain's Duty and American Brawl Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on a Captain's difficult decision and his son's involvement, culminating in an American brawl and subsequent disciplinary action for Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Surrender Decision and Surprise Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Captain decides to surrender, leading to a surprise encounter with shirtless men, one being his son.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane Weston, reporters investigating the murder of banker Robert Burgess and uncovering a complex case.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their newspaper assignment to investigate a banker's murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Twinkle Twins Story
Information from Sailor and Headquarters Decision

sub_scenes.title: Police Station and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: Investigation at the police station leads to a new lead involving a sick child in the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead
Press Passes and Revelation of Sick Child

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicion and Blood Donor Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Suspicion falls on Barnacci, and the critical need for his rare blood type to save Reilly's daughter is revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store Phone Call and New Lead
Arrival in the Irish Section and Pursuit of Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Inquiry and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Inquiry in the Irish section leads to Mrs. Murphy, who reveals Reilly's innocence and Farnacci's scheme.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Information in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Cab Chase, Roadblock, and Street Brawl
sub_scenes.description: A cab chase ensues, leading to a roadblock and a street brawl.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and De-escalation at the Roadblock

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Drive
sub_scenes.description: Medical emergency response, hospital wait, and community blood drive initiated to save Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Emergency Medical Response and Hospital Wait
Blood Transfusion Need and Community Blood Drive
Blood Type Matching and Transfusion Preparation
Blood Transfusion in Progress and Doctor's Reassurance

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Capture and Daughter's Recovery Celebration
sub_scenes.description: Plan to capture Farnacci, his arrest, forced blood donation, and celebration of Reilly's daughter's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Farnacci's Blood and Police Plan
Police Raid and Arrest of Farnacci
Birthday Celebration for Reilly's Daughter's Recovery
